sentence.Network_en: He was later criticised for his lack of foresight.
sentence.Network_cn: 他后来被指责缺少先见之明。

sentence.Network_en: She had had the foresight to prepare herself financially in case of an accident.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有先见之明，经济上作了准备以防万一发生事故。

sentence.Network_en: It required a statesman's foresight and sagacity to make the decision.
sentence.Network_cn: 作出这个决定需要政治家的远见卓识.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 远字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 远话〖 strangewords〗 远见〖 foresight;vision〗 远见卓识〖 beforesightandpossessing;wideviews〗.
预字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 预见〖 foresee;predict〗 预见〖 precognition;foresight;prevision〗 预警〖 early-warning〗.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... foresee 预知 foresight 先见之明 forest 森林.
新编大学英语单词表(第四册) - 豆丁网 ... fondness n. 喜爱， 深情 foresight n. 先见之明, 深谋远虑 gallon n. 加伦.

list.abs: 优秀课件笔记之视听巧记汉英成语2 -... ... 成语平地风波 troubles that arise all of a sudden 成语未卜先知 have foresight.
神(),组词要4个_百度知道 ... 神速[ marvellously quick] 神算[ miraculous foresight] 神态[ bearing;mien;expression;manner].
光学专业词汇 -... ... optical force 矫形力 optical foresight 光学瞄准器 optical Fourier analysis method 光学傅里叶分析法.
the technology foresight report of shanghai ., 上海技术预见报告.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from fore- + sight, probably suggested by Old Norse forsjá, forsjó

encyclopedia.content: 词性 名词 n. [U]释义1. 远见，先见之明 He is a man of foresight. 他是个有先见之明的人。2. 深谋远虑 During the blizzard I was glad I'd had the foresight to buy enough groceries. 在那场大风雪中，我庆幸自己深谋远虑，事先买了足够的食品杂货。3. 展望4. 【测】前视

entry.tran: 先见之明;预见;深谋远虑
entry.def: Someone's foresight is their ability to see what is likely to happen in the future and to take appropriate action.

example.ex: He was later criticised for his lack of foresight...
example.tran: 他后来被指责缺少先见之明。

example.ex: They had the foresight to invest in new technology.
example.tran: 他们有投资新技术的远见。

means.word_mean: 1. providence by virtue of planning prudently for the future
2. seeing ahead; knowing in advance; foreseeing

auth_sentence.content: That kind of foresight is unusual in energy country.
auth_sentence.res_content: That kind of foresight is unusual in energy country.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That kind of foresight is unusual in energy country.

auth_sentence.content: This state has the foresight to ban fracking.
auth_sentence.res_content: This state has the foresight to ban fracking.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This state has the foresight to ban fracking.

auth_sentence.content: There is a level of foresight here though.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is a level of foresight here though.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is a level of foresight here though.

Sentence.sentence: The UN had the foresight to convene a "world assembly on ageing" back in 1982, but that came and went.

means.word_mean: 预见, 先见之明;深谋远虑

sentences.en: If you had had more foresight, you would have saved yourself a lot of trouble.
sentences.cn: 如果你当时深谋远虑, 你就不会有那么多麻烦了。
